attributes.action: Make being an M.P a full time job and the only job an M.P should have.
attributes.additional_details:
As an M.P you should not and cannot be involved in any other role or career that takes up any of your time from performing one of the most important roles in the country.
Being a M.P is the only role you should have, if you want more, look elsewhere!
attributes.background: The role of a M.P is very important, I cannot see how an M.P can effectively perform his or her role as an elected member of parliament if they can have more than one job to do.
